ygData.subject: Re: Sad Encounter
ygData.msgSnippet: I just recently grouped up with a level 33 Druid, in order to have her Gate me to commons (God damn I love high level druids) and she cast SoW on me. WOW, I
ygData.messageBody:
I just recently grouped up with a level 33 Druid, in order to have her
Gate me to commons (God damn I love high level druids) and she cast SoW
on me. WOW, I think superman is the one word for it. Previously, the two
would not stack and I"d run slow, now with a drum, selo's and SoW I was
insanely fast. I then had a shaman cast something like Quickness on me,
and let me tell you, it was almost like I was drunk, the world was
zoooooooomming by me so fast :)

So all I can say, make friends with druids and shamans. They are your
friends :)

-Luini from Innoruk-


>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>Yes definitely I can easily outrun wolves and cats with the drum and
run the
>same speed as they without the drum at lvl 9
>
> Kitasi
> The mournful bard of Faydwer on E'ci
> "and no one shall work for money,
> and no one shall work for fame"
> "but each for the joy of the working,
> and each to his seperate star..."
>
>
